ComicInfo.Title: Book Two The Vampire World
ComicInfo.Summary:
The second issue in the Vampire World series adaption of Brian Lumley's Necroscope Vampire World series.
This series ran for two issues, covering book one and two of the Vampire World novels, and followed the original five part series confusingly also title Necroscope (published by Malibu).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-03 15:31:03. [CVDB266480]
